snippet: The Canadian pornographic actor suspected of dismembering and eating his former lover reveled in Paris and evaded police for days before he was caught in Berlin, authorities said.
abstract: Police officers in Vancouver, British Columbia, announce that two parcels, one containing a human head and the other a human foot, were delivered to two schools in the city; police are investigating whether packages are related to the killing of Chinese student Jun Lin in Montreal.
lead_paragraph: The Canadian pornographic actor suspected of dismembering and eating his former lover reveled in Paris and evaded police for days before he was caught in Berlin, authorities said.

headline.main: Canada: More Body Parts Turn Up
headline.print_headline: Canada: More Body Parts Turn Up
